content: treble_crochet in unworked st in r9 below returning to r10 skip next st the decrease half_double_crochet in next 6 st single_crochet in next st chain 1 skip next 2 st decrease chain 2 decrease chain 2 decrease in next st chain 1 skip next 2 st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 6 st working in front of r10 treble_crochet in unworked st in r9 below return to r10 repeat from beginning all around 7 decrease 2 treble_crochet 12 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 x chain-1 6 x chain-2 per side - 10 - r12 another tricky round - sorry - be careful not to miss out any of the trs or fptrs and remember to work all scs in front loop only 2 single_crochet in corner chain space fphdc around next petal the decrease single_crochet in next chain space fphdc around next petal working in front of r11 fptr around petal in r10 immediately below returning to r11 skip next 2 st the treble_crochet and first half_double_crochet single_crochet flo in next 6 st working in front of r11 treble_crochet in 2nd unworked st in r10 below a little way ahead returning to r11 single_crochet in next chain space fphdc around next petal single_crochet in next chain space x 3 working in front of r11 treble_crochet in 1st unworked st in r10 below a little way back returning to r11 skip next st single_crochet flo in next 6 st skip next st the treble_crochet working in front of r11 fptr around petal in r10 immediately below returning to r11 fphdc around next petal single_crochet in next chain space fphdc around next petal repeat from beginning all around 7 fphdc 2 treble_crochet 2 fptr 8 single_crochet 12 single_crochet flo per side - 11 - r13 this round is worked entirely into r11 sometimes into unworked back loops and sometimes into the top of trebles/petals which already have a front post stitch worked around them all instructions refer to stitches in round 11 ignore all stitches in r12 folding them forward out of the way as you go 4 double_crochet in top of last petal before corner chain 2 skip corner chain space 4 double_crochet in top of first petal immediately after corner skip next chain space and next petal 3 double_crochet in next st the top of the treble_crochet skip next st 2 double_crochet blo in next st skip next st x 2 3 double_crochet blo in next st skip next st next chain space next petal next chain space 2 single_crochet in top of next centre petal skip next chain space next petal next chain space and next st 3 double_crochet blo in next st skip next st 2 double_crochet blo in next st skip next st x 2 3 double_crochet in next st the top of the treble_crochet skip next st the top of the petal skip next chain space repeat from beginning all around 14 double_crochet 14 double_crochet blo 2 single_crochet 1 x chain-2 per side - 12
